info.title: Wii Exhibit
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Wii Exhibit is an online image editor where everyone views and edits the same canvas.

Controls:
A button = Draw a line
Up or down button = Adjust the line thickness
Left or right button = Adjust the line color
1 or 2 button = Refresh the image without drawing on it

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com
